analysis.description:
ETToken._acceptDividends (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#324-331) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(beneficiaryShare) (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#330-331)
ETCharPresale._isContract (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#457-464) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in ETCharPresale.fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#499-529):
	External calls:
	- tokenContract.rewardTokens(msg.sender,purchaseValue * 200) (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#521-524)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- enabled (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#525-526)

ETCharPresale._isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#457-464)
	- /unique_chucks/7/0x86fb872ff061f7d47d7c8154e6030731695ed1fe.sol#461-464
